data.name: Turmeric Indian Bistro
data.description: A cozy Indian bistro offering the best turmeric-inspired dishes in the heart of the city.
data.hours: Tue–Thu 4:00 pm–12:00 am, Fri–Sat 4:00 pm–1:00 am, Sun 2:00 pm–10:00 pm

menus.name: Discounted
menus.description: Enjoy our discounted menu offered by the restaurant with a variety of appetizers, entrées, drinks, and desserts tailored specifically for you.

items.name: Chicken Tikka
items.description: Chargrilled boneless chicken marinated in yogurt and spices.

items.name: Vegetable Biryani
items.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices, served with raita.

items.name: Dal Tadka
items.description: Yellow lentils tempered with cumin, garlic, and chili, served with steamed rice.

items.name: Nimbu Pani
items.description: Refreshing lemon-based drink flavored with cumin and mint.

items.name: Rasmalai
items.description: Soft cheese dumplings soaked in saffron and cardamom-flavored milk.

menus.name: Personalized
menus.description: This is the menu we curated for you based on your given preferences. Hit the loop button to regenerate options for that section if you want to see something else.

items.name: Vegetable Samosa
items.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and herbs.

items.name: Aloo Tikki
items.description: Golden-fried potato patties served with tangy tamarind and mint chutney.

items.name: Butter Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken simmered in a rich, buttery tomato sauce, served with basmati rice.

items.name: Chana Masala
items.description: Chickpeas cooked in a spicy tomato and onion gravy, served with naan.

items.name: Mango Lassi
items.description: Sweet and creamy yogurt-based drink with ripe mango pulp.

items.name: Gulab Jamun
items.description: Milk-based dumplings soaked in rose-scented sugar syrup.
